---
title: "Contact Us"
---

We are continually improving our tool and adding features. If you run into any issues, please add an issue directly on our [Github page](https://github.com/Tom-Wolff/ideanet/issues). If you would like to collaborate on development, propose a pull request directly on our [Github page](https://github.com/Tom-Wolff/ideanet/pulls) as well.

You can contact the IDEANet team directly at idea-net@duke.edu
